page.title: 12FARMING
page.content: We interviewed Mr.P.Lewis,at Tower Farm, Lyneal,who runs a mixed farm. That day Mr. Lewis got up at 7.30am. The first thing he does is feed the cattle.Mr. Lewis has to feed those in the sheds every day. He sprayed the crops and drenched the cattle in the morning. He has to spray the cattle for diseases and in the summer has to drench the cattle every 10 days. He looked at the cattle in the fields then. Also in the winter he has to bed the cattle with straw. The Ministry of Agriculture comes out once a year to check the cattle for T.B. Mr. Lewis has to spend alot of time on paper work.
